task.title: Adding master nodes to their resource pool

taskbody.context: This procedure adds the master nodes to their resource pool, named master. The master nodes are added to the resource pool with their public hostnames, so that you can easily see which node is active when you log in to the browser interface.

step.cmd: Use the virtual hostname (HA-Virtual-Name) or virtual IP address (HA-Virtual-IP) of the high-availability cluster to start a Bash shell on the master host .
Display the public hostname of the current node.
step.stepresult: The result is either Primary-Public-Name or Secondary-Public-Name.

step.cmd: Add the current node to the master resource pool.
